title: Plagiarized Stories

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Even if—especially if—that story is partially plagiarized from other minds.
dialogue.context: With arms open in a store setting, the AI accepts the borrowed nature of our personal narratives

scene_context: In the same store setting, the Architect stands with open arms, acknowledging that our most personal stories are partly borrowed from others.
philosophical_theme: The inevitability and value of influenced identity
visual_elements: The AI with arms spread wide in an accepting gesture
